author: Anonymous Calc
title: Quick Question
question: does the name of (@htdw) have to be the same as the name of (@htdd)?
student_answer: No, they don't always have to be the same, for example you could have a data definition called Fruit but you might want to do a world program that puts fruits in a basket, so FruitBasket might be a better name for the @htdw here. Alternatively, you could also name the @htdw Fruit, but in the end it just comes down to what's convenient for you.
